name: Holiday Shire
description:
A  new spin on an old classic! This holiday season we took our “Shire Shirt” design and made it reflect our beautiful, snowy Berkshire mountains during the winter months. Hand printed detail on the sleeve reads includes the name of the themed shirt as well as the latitude and longitude of Pittsfield, MA–home of our studio.

-Printed with 100% water-based inks
-T-Shirt is American Apparel Tri-Blend, 50/25/25 cotton-poly blend
*This tee does not shrink as much as a 100% cotton tee*

REMINDER: Each and every one of our products is printed by hand with attention and care. Slight imperfections do occur. Appreciate these imperfections!
